attributes.action: Allow students to have access to equations for the GCSE Sciences.
attributes.additional_details: Aside from levitating some pressure from the already extremely tough exams it would still allow the student to show their understanding of the equation and its' uses. They'd have to apply the correct equation to the right question as well as maintain an understanding of what the equation does.
attributes.background: Students are expected to unreasonably remember equations which will not be necessary to remember in later life for the masses.
